Title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
Genre: Animation, Action, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Romance, Thriller
Director: Kevin Altieri, Boyd Kirkland, Frank Paur, Dan Riba, Eric Radomski, Bruce Timm
Writer: Alan Burnett (story by), Alan Burnett (screenplay by), Paul Dini (screenplay by), Martin Pasko (screenplay by), Michael Reaves (screenplay by), Bob Kane (created by: Batman)
Actors: Kevin Conroy, Dana Delany, Hart Bochner, Stacy Keach
Plot: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
